name: Sarah Mitchell
title: Owner
quote: The Kautivo vending machine has been a complete game-changer for our facility. Our members absolutely love the convenience of grabbing high-quality protein bars and recovery drinks right after their workouts. We're generating nearly $7,000 in additional monthly revenue with literally zero effort on our part. The machine is beautiful, reliable, and perfectly matches our premium brand aesthetic.
highlights: Zero staff time required for management

beforeAfter.before: No retail options for post-workout nutrition

name: David Chen
title: Spa Director
quote: Our clients expect premium experiences in every aspect of their visit, and the Kautivo machine delivers exactly that. The sleek design fits perfectly in our serene environment, and the curated selection of wellness products extends our retail offerings beautifully. Clients often purchase supplements and aromatherapy products after their treatments, creating a seamless wellness journey.
highlights: Premium product selection aligns with spa values

beforeAfter.before: Limited retail space for wellness products
beforeAfter.after: Expanded product offering without additional staff

name: Mike Rodriguez
title: Co-Owner
quote: Our CrossFit athletes burn through calories and need immediate post-workout nutrition. The Kautivo machine stocks exactly what they need - protein bars, BCAAs, and recovery drinks. The real-time analytics help us understand what products our athletes prefer most, and we've been able to optimize our inventory accordingly. It's like having a 24/7 nutrition store that runs itself.
highlights: Popular with competitive athletes and weekend warriors
Reduced member complaints about nutrition options
Strong ROI despite smaller member base

beforeAfter.before: Members had to leave facility for post-workout nutrition

name: Lisa Thompson
title: Studio Owner
quote: We were initially concerned about adding any technology to our peaceful space, but the Kautivo team worked with us to customize the machine to fit our aesthetic perfectly. The gentle lighting and silent operation maintain our studio's tranquil atmosphere. Our students love having access to organic energy bars and herbal teas, especially after our longer workshops and teacher trainings.
highlights: Custom design integration with studio aesthetic

beforeAfter.before: No food or beverage options for long sessions

name: Jennifer Park
title: Wellness Program Manager
quote: Employee wellness is a top priority for our company, and the Kautivo machine perfectly supports our initiatives. Our employees appreciate having healthy snack and supplement options right in our wellness center. The machine's professional appearance and reliable operation align with our corporate standards, and the revenue helps offset our wellness program costs.
highlights: Revenue helps fund additional wellness programs
High employee satisfaction and usage rates

beforeAfter.before: Limited healthy options in company cafeteria

name: Robert Kim
title: Facility Manager
quote: Swimmers and water aerobics participants often work up quite an appetite, but we never had good options for post-swim nutrition. The Kautivo machine solved this perfectly with waterproof protein bars, electrolyte drinks, and healthy snacks. The machine's humidity-resistant design works great in our pool environment, and maintenance has been virtually non-existent.
highlights: Humidity-resistant design perfect for pool environment
Popular with competitive swimmers and casual users

beforeAfter.before: Swimmers left hungry after training sessions
